title: Mechanical work done on gas during PV cycles

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the mechanical work done on the gas?

choices.label: It is the same for processes 1 and 2 and less for process 3.
It is the same for processes 2 and 3 and less for process 1.
It is the same for all three processes.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
